Misconfigurations.Title: Delete pod logs
Misconfigurations.Description: Used to cover attackerâ€™s tracks, but most clusters ship logs quickly off-cluster.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-mgr' should not have access to resource 'pods/log' for verbs ["delete", "deletecollection", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove verbs 'delete' and 'deletecollection' for resource 'pods/log' for Role and ClusterRole

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-cmd-reporter' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-mgr' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-mgr' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-purge-osd' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-purge-osd' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage configmaps
Misconfigurations.Description: Some workloads leverage configmaps to store sensitive data or configuration parameters that affect runtime behavior that can be modified by an attacker or combined with another issue to potentially lead to compromise.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-cmd-reporter' should not have access to resource 'configmaps' for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove write permission verbs for resource 'configmaps'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage configmaps
Misconfigurations.Description: Some workloads leverage configmaps to store sensitive data or configuration parameters that affect runtime behavior that can be modified by an attacker or combined with another issue to potentially lead to compromise.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-osd' should not have access to resource 'configmaps' for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove write permission verbs for resource 'configmaps'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes networking
Misconfigurations.Description: The ability to control which pods get service traffic directed to them allows for interception attacks. Controlling network policy allows for bypassing lateral movement restrictions.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-mgr' should not have access to resources ["services", "endpoints", "endpointslices", "networkpolicies", "ingresses"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Networking resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage namespace secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Viewing secrets at the namespace scope can lead to escalation if another service account in that namespace has a higher privileged rolebinding or clusterrolebinding bound.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-osd' shouldn't have access to manage secrets in namespace 'null'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Manage namespace secrets are not allowed. Remove resource 'secrets' from role

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrolebinding rook-ceph-mgr-cluster in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: clusterrolebinding rook-ceph-osd in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Viewing secrets at the cluster-scope is akin to cluster-admin in most clusters as there are typically at least one service accounts (their token stored in a secret) bound to cluster-admin directly or a role/clusterrole that gives similar permissions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'cephfs-external-provisioner-runner' shouldn't have access to manage resource 'secrets'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Manage secrets are not allowed. Remove resource 'secrets' from cluster role

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Viewing secrets at the cluster-scope is akin to cluster-admin in most clusters as there are typically at least one service accounts (their token stored in a secret) bound to cluster-admin directly or a role/clusterrole that gives similar permissions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'objectstorage-provisioner-role' shouldn't have access to manage resource 'secrets'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Manage secrets are not allowed. Remove resource 'secrets' from cluster role

Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'rook-ceph-cluster-mgmt' should not have access to resource 'pods/log' for verbs ["delete", "deletecollection", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove verbs 'delete' and 'deletecollection' for resource 'pods/log' for Role and ClusterRole

Misconfigurations.Title: Do not allow privilege escalation from node proxy
Misconfigurations.Description: Check whether role permits privilege escalation from node proxy
Misconfigurations.Message: Role permits privilege escalation from node proxy
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Create a role which does not permit privilege escalation from node proxy

Misconfigurations.Title: Do not allow privilege escalation from node proxy
Misconfigurations.Description: Check whether role permits privilege escalation from node proxy
Misconfigurations.Message: Role permits privilege escalation from node proxy
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Create a role which does not permit privilege escalation from node proxy

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'rook-ceph-cluster-mgmt' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'rook-ceph-global' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'rook-ceph-global' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage configmaps
Misconfigurations.Description: Some workloads leverage configmaps to store sensitive data or configuration parameters that affect runtime behavior that can be modified by an attacker or combined with another issue to potentially lead to compromise.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'rook-ceph-cluster-mgmt' should not have access to resource 'configmaps' for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove write permission verbs for resource 'configmaps'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage configmaps
Misconfigurations.Description: Some workloads leverage configmaps to store sensitive data or configuration parameters that affect runtime behavior that can be modified by an attacker or combined with another issue to potentially lead to compromise.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'rook-ceph-object-bucket' should not have access to resource 'configmaps' for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove write permission verbs for resource 'configmaps'

Misconfigurations.Title: Exec into Pods
Misconfigurations.Description: The ability to exec into a container with privileged access to the host or with an attached SA with higher RBAC permissions is a common escalation path to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'rook-ceph-system' should not have access to resource '["pods/exec"]' for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove write permission verbs for resource 'pods/exec'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes networking
Misconfigurations.Description: The ability to control which pods get service traffic directed to them allows for interception attacks. Controlling network policy allows for bypassing lateral movement restrictions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'rook-ceph-cluster-mgmt' should not have access to resources ["services", "endpoints", "endpointslices", "networkpolicies", "ingresses"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Networking resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes networking
Misconfigurations.Description: The ability to control which pods get service traffic directed to them allows for interception attacks. Controlling network policy allows for bypassing lateral movement restrictions.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'rook-ceph-global' should not have access to resources ["services", "endpoints", "endpointslices", "networkpolicies", "ingresses"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Networking resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage webhookconfigurations
Misconfigurations.Description: Webhooks can silently intercept or actively mutate/block resources as they are being created or updated. This includes secrets and pod specs.
Misconfigurations.Message: ClusterRole 'rook-ceph-system' should not have access to resources ["mutatingwebhookconfigurations", "validatingwebhookconfigurations"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove webhook configuration resouces/verbs, acceptable values for verbs ['get', 'list', 'watch']

Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rook-ceph-operator' of Deployment 'rook-ceph-operator' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'set containers[].securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to 'false'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rook-ceph-operator' of Deployment 'rook-ceph-operator' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Add 'ALL' to containers[].securityContext.capabilities.drop.

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rook-ceph-operator' of Deployment 'rook-ceph-operator' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Change 'containers[].securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to 'true'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hostâ€™s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rook-ceph-operator' of Deployment 'rook-ceph-operator' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsUser' to an integer > 10000.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hostâ€™s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rook-ceph-operator' of Deployment 'rook-ceph-operator' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to an integer > 10000.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.securityContext.seccompProfile.type', 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.seccompProfile' and 'spec.initContainers[*].securityContext.seccompProfile' to 'RuntimeDefault' or undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container rook-ceph-operator of deployment rook-ceph-operator in default namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-system' should not have access to resources ["pods", "deployments", "jobs", "cronjobs", "statefulsets", "daemonsets", "replicasets", "replicationcontrollers"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods
Misconfigurations.Description: Depending on the policies enforced by the admission controller, this permission ranges from the ability to steal compute (crypto) by running workloads or allowing for creating workloads that escape to the node as root and escalation to cluster-admin.

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes workloads and pods

Misconfigurations.Resolution: Kubernetes workloads resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage configmaps
Misconfigurations.Description: Some workloads leverage configmaps to store sensitive data or configuration parameters that affect runtime behavior that can be modified by an attacker or combined with another issue to potentially lead to compromise.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-system' should not have access to resource 'configmaps' for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove write permission verbs for resource 'configmaps'

Misconfigurations.Title: Manage Kubernetes networking
Misconfigurations.Description: The ability to control which pods get service traffic directed to them allows for interception attacks. Controlling network policy allows for bypassing lateral movement restrictions.
Misconfigurations.Message: Role 'rook-ceph-system' should not have access to resources ["services", "endpoints", "endpointslices", "networkpolicies", "ingresses"] for verbs ["create", "update", "patch", "delete", "deletecollection", "impersonate", "*"]
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Networking resources are only allowed for verbs 'list', 'watch', 'get'

Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: serviceaccount rook-csi-cephfs-plugin-sa in null namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.
